ThingDef.label: animal ranged spinneret
ThingDef.description: A ranged spinneret implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged stunning web attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a ranged spinneret will have no effect.

ThingDef.label: animal venomous spitter
ThingDef.description: A venomous spitter implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous spit attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a venomous spitter will have no effect. This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).

ThingDef.label: animal acidic spitter
ThingDef.description: An acidic spitter implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acidic spit attack that causes additional damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has an acidic spitter will have no effect. This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).

ThingDef.label: animal barbed quill thrower
ThingDef.description: A barbed quill thrower implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous quill attack that causes toxic buildup.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a barbed quill thrower will have no effect.

ThingDef.label: animal quad tesla cannon
ThingDef.description: A quad tesla cannon implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged plasma attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a quad tesla cannon will have no effect.

ThingDef.label: animal bioelectric organ
ThingDef.description: A bioelectric organ implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged electric attack that may paralyze and cause heart attacks.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a bioelectric organ will have no effect.

ThingDef.label: animal light focusing lens
ThingDef.description: A light focusing lens implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged laser attack that sets enemies on fire.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a light focusing lens will have no effect. This implant takes the space of one of the creature's eyes, so it can't be installed in eyeless animals.

ThingDef.label: animal hyper acidic stomach
ThingDef.description: A hyper acidic stomach implant. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acid attack that causes damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a hyper acidic stomach will have no effect. This implant takes the space of the creature's stomach, so it can't be installed in animals that lack one.
